title: Deformations of the root systems and new solutions to generalised WDVV equations
abstract: A special class of solutions to the generalised WDVV equations related to a finite set of covectors is investigated. Some geometric conditions on such a set which guarantee that the corresponding function satisfies WDVV equations are found (check-conditions). These conditions are satisfied for all root systems and their special deformations discovered in the theory of the Calogero-Moser systems by O.Chalykh, M.Feigin and the author. This leads to the new solutions for the generalized WDVV equations.
